author: Vexed (Vexed#9000)
description: Beautify and minify JSON. Supports attachments, codeblocks and replies.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing! This cog will replace the default `uptime` command when loaded.
This cog writes to config every 60 seconds to prevent data loss. It is storage efficient, using under 150 bytes per day.

**Please carefully read the information bellow about some of the cog's inner workings.**

When you first load the cog, the `uptime` command will say **data may be inaccurate** for first **15** minutes. Once the cog's been running for a while, data over 30 days old will no longer be counted in the `uptime` command.

Please avoid excessively reloading the cog. This cog tries to handle unloads/reloads but you might experience limited data loss.

This cog has docs! Check them out at <https://go.vexcodes.com/c/betteruptime>
name: Beautify
short: Beautify and minify JSON. Supports attachments, codeblocks and replies.
